title: WTB-PSA Baker, Joss portrait PSA 4 or better and more

posts.post_title: WTB-PSA Baker, Joss portrait PSA 4 or better and more
posts.post_content:
Working on a few upgrades for my 520 set.  The above are the focus but if you have any 4-6 you're thinking of selling, let me know that as well.  Would love to keep upgrading the set!!

PM if you have anything you'd like to sell.  

Thanks!
